oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pension increase notification
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This notification from the Department of the Interior, Bureau of Pensions, informed Elliott H. Boyd that his pension had been increased to $30 per month, effective June 10, 1918. Boyd had served as a private in Co. G, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. He enlisted in Pikeville, Tenn. on February 20, 1865 and listed his occupation as a farmer. The 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA served mainly in North Georgia against the guerrilla band under John P. Gatewood.
